review.title: “A good step into the IT Channel world”
review.pros: Pros – e-Volve is an innovative company and offers an IT Procurement Solution thats feasible and supports the procurement needs and policies of End Users procuring technology which includes but is not limited to Multiple Sourcing and Delivery Locations and Asset Management. Its very uplifting when you work for a company who carry a unique solution in the market.
review.cons: Cons – Work life balance just wasnt there. Although the system allowed us to work uder low overheads, the company, whilst I was there, was just not doing enough to support the growth.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – They understood the requirements of the company but didnt really get a grasp nor actioned the needs of the employees who performed. I guess, if anything, my advice would be to putmore value in that area.
